title: Ranbir Kapoor will spend entire week in jail, reason would surprise you - India TV
text:
Ranbir Kapoor will spend entire week in jail, reason would surprise you Ranbir Kapoor will spend entire week in jail, reason would surprise you Actor Ranbir Kapoor, who is going extra miles for his forthcoming biopic on Sanjay Dutt, is now planning to spent entire week in jail, claims a latest media report. After putting on around 13 India TV Entertainment Desk, New Delhi [ Published on: 09 Mar 2017, 11:05:41] Ranbir Kapoor will spend entire week in jail, reason would surprise you Actor Ranbir Kapoor, who is going extra miles for his forthcoming biopic on Sanjay Dutt, is now planning to spent entire week in jail, claims a latest media report. 
After putting on around 13 kilos weight to get a look closer to Sanjay Dutt, this is Ranbir Kapoor’s another praiseworthy effort to fit into Dutt’s character on his biopic. 
The report suggest that Ranbir has already reached Bhopal and will be spending the entire week in jail. 
It is worthy to mention here that actor Sanjay Dutt has spent a year in Pune’s Yerwada jail, while he was sentenced for possessing illegal arms. 
The 'Ae Dil Hai Mushkil' star, Ranbir Kapoor, who is not leaving any stone unturned to resemble actor Sanjay Dutt for his biopic, now wants to get a real experience for his film. 
Recently, the actor even got a similar tattoo inked as actor Sanjay Dutt used to sport, for his film. 
Interestingly, versatile actor Paresh Rawal will be seen performing the character of Sunil Dutt in the film. Actress Sonam Kapoor will be playing Sanjay’s love interest. Anushka Sharma will be playing the character of a journalist while Manisha Koirala plays as Nargis. 
Sources also revealed that the complete crew of the film including the director Rajkumar Hirani along with Ranbir Kapoor will be staying in Bhopal for a week. 
The shooting of the film began in January this month. Currently, actor Sanjay Dutt is busy in the shooting of ‘Bhoomi’. Related Tags:
